title: Firefox Crashes After Download
content:
Once I download a file using Firefox attempts to install result in the browser crashing.

This doesn't happen with other browsers.
creator: harrisstacy

title: Lost pinned sites in homepage after sync on new firefox install
content: I installed firefox on a new pc and after loggin in and syncing my account all my pinned sites on the firefox homepage disappeared. Is there any way i can get them back?
creator: ivar.nuij
